resources.string: CREATE TABLE player_rounds ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, round_id INTEGER, person_id INTEGER, amount FLOAT, mahjongg BIT, wind INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY(round_id) REFERENCES rounds(id) );

SELECT rounds.id, pr1.person_id, pr1.amount, pr2.person_id, pr2.amount, pr3.person_id, pr3.amount, pr4.person_id, pr4.amount FROM rounds LEFT JOIN player_rounds pr1 ON (pr1.round_id = rounds.id) LEFT JOIN player_rounds pr2 ON (pr2.round_id = rounds.id) LEFT JOIN player_rounds pr3 ON (pr3.round_id = rounds.id) LEFT JOIN player_rounds pr4 ON (pr4.round_id = rounds.id) WHERE pr1.person_id = ? AND pr2.person_id = ? AND pr3.person_id = ? AND pr4.person_id = ?
